summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 9.8°C) and outside temperature (down 9.5°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 10%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 312 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles) and cloud levels (up 200 m) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; cold spells are likely. Also, dry air conditions likely prevail and mostly calm with light air movement. Possible light showers, overcast skies with low cloud, and the light is absent. Little change in the weather.
